mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_GSRLTREPYMTINF set INFOIDTYPE = #{InfoIDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARLPNAME = #{ArlpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARLPCERTTYPE = #{ArlpCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARLPCERTNUM = #{ArlpCertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARLPTYPE = #{ArlpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARLPAMT = #{ArlpAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WARTYSIGN = #{WartySign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAXGUARMCC = #{MaxGuarMcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO = #{RltRepymtInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GSRLTREPYMTINFSEQNO = #{GsRltRepymtInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, GSRLTREPYMTINFSEQNO, INFOIDTYPE, ARLPNAME, ARLPCERTTYPE, ARLPCERTNUM, ARLPTYPE, ARLPAMT, WARTYSIGN, MAXGUARMCC, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_GSRLTREPYMTINF

select RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO,GSRLTREPYMTINFSEQNO ,INFOIDTYPE, ARLPNAME, ARLPCERTTYPE, ARLPCERTNUM, ARLPTYPE, ARLPAMT, WARTYSIGN, MAXGUARMCC,REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_GSRLTREPYMTINF where RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO = #{RltRepymtInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
